item.title: Keep Your Receipts Neat Electronically
item.description:
Let’s be honest, dealing with taxes and the mountain of receipts that come with them is a real pain. Finding, organizing, and categorizing each tiny slip of paper is a tedious task. Thankfully, technology can simplify this process. The NEAT Receipts Professional Mobile Receipt and Document Scanner and Software Combination Version 3.0 offers a solution. This portable, wand-like scanner allows you to scan receipts, documents, and business cards directly to your computer...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/keep-your-receipts-neat-electronically/

item.title: Alternative uses for existing products
item.description:
A client needed a system to track expenses online. They were looking for a basic solution and found the popular options too expensive. While searching for alternatives, I realized they already owned a software called Project Accounting, but weren’t using its expense features. We decided to implement the Time and Expense portion of their existing software to meet their needs. This was a much more affordable option, especially since they didn’t need the full functionality of the software...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/alternative-uses-for-existing-products/
